titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 125) to repeal the ban on semi-automatic assault weapons and the ban on large capacity ammunition.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Barr. Petition No: 104-11.

bill.summary: 2/23/1996--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 125 (repeal of ban on semiautomatic assault weapons).
